attributes.action: Allow Weddings to go ahead after 21st June and introduce Lateral Flow Testing.
attributes.additional_details:
Using the same methodology which was used for other big events which have been tested. 

This will helps support those who have planned the wedding post 21st June and will also support the wedding industry overall.
attributes.background: Within uncertainty around the 21st June there are many couples  concerned about their special days. Including Weddings & other ceremonies. After June 21st go ahead and allow these ceremonies to take place with 100 guests however implement lateral flow testing before.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Allow weddings without restrictions if guest are vaccinated or test negative: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588937
